dict.acceptation: 放弃；停止；（故意）降下；垂下（眼睛）；
（水或其他液体）滴；结束；（因受伤或死等）倒下；退出；

sent.orig: Well, I probably wouldn't call another man drop-dead gorgeous, but you can.
sent.trans: 嗯，我也不知道谁可以称得上是drop-deadgorgeous的大帅哥。

sent.orig: Second, we have discussed the locally cauchy sequence、 locally complete and locally drop property in lcs.
sent.trans: 第二部分主要讨论了局部凸分离空间的局部Cauchy列、局部完备性和局部Drop性质。

sent.orig: Don't let baby drop drop drop!
Eng: How much dew would a dewdrop drop if a dew-drop could drop dew?
sent.trans: 英格：假如一颗露珠会掉下露水，那么一颗露珠会掉下多少露水呢？

sent.orig: From the life of drop by drop, in the company of concern and care.
sent.trans: 从生活的一点一滴中体现公司对职工的关心、爱护。
